title: Yaary Driver App
description: Yaary is built on ONDC protocols and is the first driver focussed mobility service provider in the country. Yaary provides the ownership and control back to drivers by enabling them with technology at a low flat fee and zero commission model.
descriptionHTML: Yaary is built on ONDC protocols and is the first driver focussed mobility service provider in the country. Yaary provides the ownership and control back to drivers by enabling them with technology at a low flat fee and zero commission model.
summary: Yaary - zero commission app for drivers
recentChanges:
Yes, we listened and truly sorry for the 'Happy Dent' advertisement we did on your phone displays. The brightness control is now fixed for good.
You might also notice the revamp of our ride acceptance screen. Lot of your feedback has been addressed apart from few bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: I have downloaded these app before 2 months and I have uploaded all documents but there is no response in the app and again it's is connected to WhatsApp waist of time I think doing some kind of joke waisting public time and riders time so please go on with ola uber rapido and porter there is to much work to earn money 🤑🤑🤑
I have a issue with yaary driver app , the screen time is limited ,and the app is closing,.... Please increase the screen time... Expect that The app is good and It's a best app for auto drivers
All documents are verified but it's showing connect with buddy's on WhatsApp if I click to connect there is showing group is full resolve 😕 this trouble ASAP....
I had submitted all documents before 10days but till now my account is not activated to take rides On the screen it's showing simply all done that's it. Don't download it my beloved driver brothers.
Last battery option not going to access. Its very bad experience & process to operate this application.
